RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 9100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CUPID'S NUMBER just off leader early on, took over from the turn, drew off, held sway to the wire. HESTON unhurried from outside to the turn, rallied on well, coming oin. THISPOINTINTIME no speed from the gate, stayed back to the stretch passed two. HOW IT GOES tried to keep up to the stretch with nothing left in the drive. KING T'CHALLA inside speed to the turn, gave way readily on the rail.

ENTRY.NAME: King T'challa
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the turn, gave way readily on the rail

ENTRY.NAME: Cupid's Number
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leader early on, took over from the turn, drew off, held

ENTRY.NAME: Thispointintime
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed from the gate, stayed back to the stretch passed two

ENTRY.NAME: Heston
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried from outside to the turn, rallied on well, coming oin

ENTRY.NAME: How It Goes
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to the stretch with nothing left in the drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 75. Claiming Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $16,000 Or Less N ot Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWIRLING PATTI sprinted away quickly to the front, well rated while tons best. SHRIMPIE saved ground while taking up the chase from far turn, vanned off in distress after the finish while galloping out. ALSANAH trailed to the far turn, ran on in the stretch to pass a couple. WATER FIGHT raced along from off the rail, moved up far turn while evenly. EASY IS GOOD chased winner to the half, could not keep up and faded back on empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Is Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the half, could not keep up and faded back

ENTRY.NAME: Shrimpie
ENTRY.OWNER: Kuntz Mark D and Dalton Ken
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground while taking up the chase from far turn, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Water Fight
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along from off the rail, moved up far turn while evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Twirling Patti
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted away quickly to the front, well rated while tons best

ENTRY.NAME: Alsanah
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the far turn, ran on in the stretch to pass a couple

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 18400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since April 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Fo r $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OFF THE CHARTS slow into stride outside, ran up outside far turn, shaken up and cleared off under steady urging in the stretch run. MYSTIQUE SABOTEUR dueled to the half, could not stay with winner in the stretch run. BELLE OF ST. JOHN tried to keep for a half, gave in and settled for show spot. LEDGENDARY KITTEN inside trip throughout to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Ledgendary Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip throughout to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Belle of St. John
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep for a half, gave in and settled for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Mystique Saboteur
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to the half, could not stay with winner in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Off the Charts
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride outside, ran up outside far turn, cleared off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since April 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $1 0,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUM KINDA PRETTY loped along on the lead under good handling, dug in gamely and stayed on to the wire. ENDLESS no speed to far turn, circled the field while coming on too late in the final going. TAMI ANN unhurried to the half from inside, bid into far turn with no late kick in the final sixteenth. TRULY A DREAM chased top pair to eighth pole but could not go on in the lane. MI ENLACE chased winner to the half, could not go on and wilted in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Endless
ENTRY.OWNER: Cox Christopher J and Adams Janey
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, circled field while coming on too late

ENTRY.NAME: Sum Kinda Pretty
ENTRY.COMMENT: loped along on the lead under good handling, stayed on to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Tami Ann
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the half from inside, bid into far turn no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Truly a Dream
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to eighth pole, could not go on in the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mi Enlace
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the half, could not go on and wilted in stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OVERHAUL hooked in a dig dong battle to the stretch, responded to urging and cleared off in the final seventy yards in a good effort. PENNY'S PROSPECT inside speed to duel winner to deep stretch while no match in the late going. A. P. AVATAR chased top pair to stretch, grinded away in the stretch run but could not go on and settled for show. GRAY DAY shuffled back after the start, never menaced thereafter. BOOSTERIZED always trailed while far back in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Penny's Prospect
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to duel winner to deep stretch, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Overhaul
ENTRY.COMMENT: hooked in a dig dong battle to stretch, responded, cleared off

ENTRY.NAME: A. P. Avatar
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to stretch, could not go on settled for show

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back after start, never menaced thereafter

ENTRY.NAME: Boosterized
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed while far back in the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 84. Starter Allowance Purse 21800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $10,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since April 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $12,500).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POWER BANKER rail speed to the front under confident handling while in a commanding effort. SHEZA FINE JUSTICE off rail chase to the stretch, rallied along for place spot while no match. CONGRATS JENSEN chased monster to the stretch, outgamed late for place spot late. BEEBLEGEE raced along evenly while no threat throughout. LA LA ANGEL tried to keep up from inside to no avail and faded back readily.

ENTRY.NAME: La La Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up from inside to no avail, faded back readily

ENTRY.NAME: Power Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: rail speed to the front, confidently handled in commanding effort

ENTRY.NAME: Congrats Jensen
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased monster to the stretch, outgamed for place spot late

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Fine Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail chase to stretch, rallied along for place spot no match

ENTRY.NAME: Beeblegee
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly while no threat throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 64. Allowance Purse 26700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not ConsideredIn Allow ances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLAZING BURROUGHS tardy from gate, no speed to turn, all out effort with a grinding effort to be along in time. OKLAHOMA JOE sprinted to the front, led to deep stretch, wore down on the wire. CHOCOLATE RABBIT broke awkward, rushed outside to contend, stayed wide for show. UNEEDTOCOMEHOME chased pace to stretch from inside, could not go on late. MARVIN'S EXPRESS raced along evenly with no late response when needed. HONKY TONK MUSIC failed to reach contention.

ENTRY.NAME: Oklahoma Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to the front, led to deep stretch, grinded down on wire

ENTRY.NAME: Blazing Burroughs
ENTRY.COMMENT: tardy from gate, no speed to turn, all out effort, along in time

ENTRY.NAME: Marvin's Express
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer and Beckett Racing Team LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Honky Tonk Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to reach contention

ENTRY.NAME: Chocolate Rabbit
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkward, rushed outside to contend, stayed wide for show

ENTRY.NAME: Uneedtocomehome
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to stretch from inside, could not go on late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZERO CLICK inside speed to the front, well rated throughout, dug in gamely to prevail on the wire in a good effort. REINA DEL BALI inside position to far turn, rallied on to just miss on the wire. POINT OF INFINITY trailed to far turn outside, rallied with a rush too late at wire. ARTEMUS SWEETHEART no hurry early on, rallied wide from far turn, finished fast late. REINA BELLA good position three wide to far turn, forged to late lead but came up empty. DOGWOODS BECCA between horses to far turn, never far back, no late kick. NOBLES FEELINGS well off rail to far turn, moved up to quarter pole, emptied out. MARLAND good speed to battle for a half, gave way readily from inside through the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Dogwoods Becca
ENTRY.OWNER: Scott Anthony L Scott Chris L and Scott Mindy
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to far turn, never far back with no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Reina Del Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside position to far turn, rallied on to just missed on wire

ENTRY.NAME: Point of Infinity
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to far turn outside, rallied with a rush too late at wire

ENTRY.NAME: Zero Click
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, well rated throughout, dug in gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Marland
ENTRY.COMMENT: good speed to battle for a half, gave way readily inside stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Reina Bella
ENTRY.OWNER: Sweet Carolina Racing and Bourbon LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position three wide to far turn, forged to late lead, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Artemus Sweetheart
ENTRY.OWNER: Borchetta Mike Borchetta Martha and Borchetta Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: no hurry early on, rallied wide from far turn, finished fast late

ENTRY.NAME: Nobles Feelings
ENTRY.COMMENT: well off rail to far turn, moved up to quarter pole, emptied out
